scripts.prod: cp config/app.json dist/config/app.json && cp config/config.json dist/config/config.json && env NODE_ENV=production node dist/app.js
scripts.dev: cp config/app.json dist/config/app.json && cp config/config.json dist/config/config.json && env NODE_ENV=development node dist/app.js
scripts.tsc: rm -rf dist/ && tsc && cp -r public dist/public
scripts.inspect: rm -rf dist/ && tsc && cp -r public dist/public && node --inspect ./dist/app.js
scripts.build-binaries: rm -rf dist/ && tsc && cp config/app.json dist/config/app.json && cp config/config.json dist/config/config.json && pkg . --target node12-alpine-x64,node12-macos-x64 --out-path binaries
scripts.start-ecs: cp config/app.json dist/config/app.json && cp config/config.json dist/config/config.json && export NODE_ENV=production && node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/app.js
